Bima Sakti Mengenang Alfin Lestaluhu sebagai Sosok Panutan
01 Nov 2019, 21:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Punggawa Timnas Indonesia U-16, Alfin Lestaluhu kini telah tiada. Dia menghembuskan nafas terakhirnya di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019) malam, pukul 22.11 WIB, karena menderita sakit infeksi pada otaknya.
Semasa hidupnya, almarhum dikenal sebagai sosok yang baik oleh pelatih Timnas Indonesia U-16, Bima Sakti Tukiman. Dia juga taat dalam beribadah dan memiliki suara yang merdu saat mengumandangkan adzan.
"Saya bisa katakan Alfin merupakan sosok yang penuh tanggung jawab di tim kami. Satu yang paling melekat dari diri Alfin ialah dia sosok yang sangat rajin dalam melakukan ibadah, bahkan lima waktunya tidak pernah tertinggal," ujar Bima, Jumat (1/11).
"Selain itu, Alfin sangat merdu dalam mengumandangkan adzan. Ketika kami sholat pemain pasti selalu kami beri kesempatan untuk mengumandangkan adzan dan Alfin menjadi sosok pemain yang sangat merdu ketika adzan," katanya menambahkan.

The Milky Way Remembers Alfin Lestaluhu as a Role Model
Nov 01 2019, 21:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian U-16 national team retainer Alfin Lestaluhu is now gone. He exhaled his last breath at Harapan Kita Hospital, Jakarta, Thursday (10/31/2019) night, at 22.11 WIB, due to suffering from an infection pain in his brain.
During his life, the deceased was known as a good figure by the coach of the U-16 Indonesian National Team, the Milky Way of the Settlement. He is also devout in worship and has a melodious voice when the call to prayer.
"I can say Alfin is a responsible figure in our team. The one that is most attached to Alfin is that he is very diligent in conducting worship, even five of his time was never left behind," said Bima, Friday (1/11).
"In addition, Alfin was very melodious in the call to prayer. When we pray the players will certainly always give us the opportunity to echo the call to prayer and Alfin becomes a very melodious player when the call to prayer," he added.
